nodes.text: Thomkins Watam was a human male who worked as a chauffeur in the city of Canto Bight on the planet Cantonica. He wore an all black uniform including boots, pants, gloves a shirt and a belt along with a formal pointed chauffeur's hat. His right glove was fitted with a concealed pocket to carry bribes. Watam had fair skin, brown hair and green eyes.

Thomkins Watam first appeared in the film Star Wars: Episode VIII The Last Jedi, which was released on December 15, 2017. The character was not named in the film, but received identification in Star Wars: The Last Jedi: The Visual Dictionary, a reference book written by Pablo Hidalgo and released in conjunction with the film.
